channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Swathes of industrial plastic dumped, 20th August
item.description:
Plastic sheeting dumped in several places up this road - it was reported several months ago but is still present.

item.title: Flytip On Cotswold Way Road, 17th August
item.description:
The location is the Cotswold Way Road about 20 yards from the Burnt Oak Crossroads on the right hand side - going towards the crossroads and just inside the wooded section of this road.. Please can it be cleared up as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham

item.title: The grass has not been cut all year /, 16th August
item.description:
We are having Open Gardens in Prestbury to raise money for charities 4th 5th September.It would be really helpful if the grass on the Burgage could be cut. Very long and straggly .Strimmer for an hour.We could do it ourselves if allowed. Many thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Scout Headquarters The Burgage, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing drain cover on A40, 15th August
item.description:
There is a drain cover / grill missing, heading towards Cheltenham roughly half way down the hill. Could be fatal for a cyclist hitting it at speed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Whittington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over grown bush and brambles, 15th August

item.title: Another broken kerb, 14th August
item.description:
Broken kerb on holtham avenue. 3/4 of the way down the street. To be honest the whole road needs addressing. This is the same problem on every kerb. The kerbs are to high and not laid in the road, they are laid on top of the road which leads to the kerbs falling down and this becomes dangerous for pedestrians and causes damage to cars in the local area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 33 Holtham Avenue, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet
